text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: …It should be starting soon, shouldn't it? Fufuu, even just waiting for it to start is fun, isn't it?
Going back a bit―
Well then, I'll be off. I'll let you know when I'll be returning home.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Oh, Trainer-san? How do you do? What a coincidence.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Yes, to the theater to see a play. Actually, the sponsor invited me by giving me this pair ticket.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: At first I planned to come with my older sister but, unfortunately her race schedule is quite full…… Oh.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Um, I know it's a bit sudden but, if you'd like, how about joining me?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: I'm happy I was able to come with Trainer-san. It's a very popular work so, I've been wanting to see it for quite a while.
choice_data_list: What kind of story is it?
What kind of story is it?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Two knights that are close friends, for the sake of becoming famous, head to an old castle to exterminate ghosts. It seems to be a comedy.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: It seems to be based on a classic, and as a contemporary drama it's worth seeing… Oh, it's starting.

text_block_list.name: Knight A
text_block_list.text: Look there, friend. Surely that, is the cursed castle that only appears at night! How imposing it seems…

text_block_list.name: Knight B
text_block_list.text: However, I do not fear this ominous spirit! Oh God, please watch over this subjugation! Now is the time to make our heroism known―

text_block_list.name: The 2 Knights
text_block_list.text: A g-g-g-ghost?! Wait, was that you?! …Hey, stop copying me!! Why you～～!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Oh! ……Fufuu.
As would be expected of the topic, it was fun. But above all, Mejiro Ardan would often let out a giggle and the change in her expression was impressive―

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Just as you would expect from it's popularity. The way those two would jump in surprise at every sound was really cute.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: But… it was a bit unfortunate they never met that spirit in the end. If it was me I likely would keep on returning to the castle without giving up.
choice_data_list: You want to meet one that badly?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Enough to want to speak with them over tea. They would definitely be someone who knew the long history of the castle―

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: If I could speak to them…… for someone who was forgotten for so long, that brilliant moment would be almost enough to revive them, don't you think?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: ………Oh, there's a very pleasant breeze, isn't there?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Um, Trainer-san? If it's fine with you, how about taking a short walk? It's very beautiful this evening, so―
choice_data_list: You think we could find that castle now?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: ……Fufuu, if we could, that would be wonderful, don't you think?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: When I was a child, after seeing that play I would often wonder what would happen if I was that spirit.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Would I become a boy? Would I become an old lady? Would I go on adventures, or would I sometimes do something mischievious and get scolded?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: This one life that everyone is limited to, only within our imagination can we switch with another. Almost like a hidden play, it sounds very fun…
choice_data_list: Are you imagining becoming a knight now?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: I wonder? Or maybe I'd be the spirit the knights came to subdue, that only had an interest in just observing them, you know?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: …Let's see. If the knights could perceive it, I'm sure the spirit would definitely want to talk with the knights.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: If I was the spirit, I think I would want to know what kind of people the knights were.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: For example, wondering what the knights were like when they were young, and what led them to becoming who they were.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: -Oh, so something like that happened! Fufuu, Trainer-san, when you were a child you must have been adorable.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: For some reason, no matter how much I hear, I just want to know more. Trainer-san, what other kinds things did you do?
choice_data_list: Let's see, around this time of year……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: ……Eh? Ah……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: P-please excuse me. This…… to think that I'd……
choice_data_list: After all that walking, of course you'd get hungry
After all that walking, of course you'd get hungry

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Oh… before I realized, we came this far? I was so absorbed in our conversation, I didn't even realize.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: …To think I'd be walking this much. So I don't make anyone worry, I should probably hold back a bit.
choice_data_list: "Right now" you should be fine with this much, right?
"Right now" you should be fine with this much, right?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Ah……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: That's why… if it's alright. Starting tomorrow, how about making this the normal training menu?
I was thinking the same thing

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Oh! ……Fufuu. I guess I have to be thankful for "now". Lately, it seems like my condition has gotten better. I don't get so feverish I can't move anymore.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: (That's right… at that time and even now. Trainer-san is always…)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: (How strange… for some reason, my chest feels warm… Trainer-san, really-)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Ah… no, it's nothing. It's just, I was thinking that today I had a lot of fun.
choice_data_list: I'm sure it'll make dinner that much tastier
I'm sure it'll make dinner that much tastier

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Geez, please don't tease me like that. But―

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Yes… today was a truly fulfilling day. Surprisingly, I learned something new about myself today.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: ……Fufuu, that's a secret.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: It seems the sun is setting. Before we meet a real life spirit, we should probably head back home.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, for accepting my sudden invitation and accompanying me today, thank you very much.
She casually avoided the question with a joke. But it felt like the distance between Mejiro Ardan and myself had shrunk just a little bit.
